full_text: Page 2802 MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 08/02/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 1203 1204 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 82 83 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 407 409 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1233 1234 8:30- 9:00 AM 83 83 4:30-5:00 PM 436 437 1:00-1:30 AM 105 106 9:00-9:30 AM 938 935 5:00 -5:30 PM 616 617 1:30-2:00 AM 133 134 9:30-10:00 AM 1013 1014 5:30-6:00 PM 537 537 2:00-2:30 AM 204 205 10:00-10:30 AM 1031 1038 6:00-6:30 PM 610 611 2:30-3:00 AM 233 234 10:30-11:00 AM 18 119 6:30-7:00 PM 642 643 3:00-3:30 AM 303 304 11:00-11:30 AM 50 51 7:00-7:30 PM 714 715 3:30-4:00 AM 382 333 11:30-12:00 AM 1618 1219 7:30-8:00 PM 742 743 4:00-4:30 AM 404 405 12:00-12:30 PM 1239 1238 8:00-8:30 PM 817 819 4:30-5:00 AM 434 43 12:30- 1:00 PM 09 10 8:30- 9:00 PM 837 838 5:00 -5:30 AM 505 506 1:00-1:30 PM 31 38 9:00-9:30 PM 916 917 5:30-6:00 AM 532 532 1:30-2:00 PM 234 237 9:30-10:00 PM 937 938 6:00-6:30 AM 605 605 2:00-2:30 PM 312 313 10:00-10:30 PM 1013 1014 6:30-7:00 AM 632 633 2:30-3:00 PM 234 237 10:30-11:00 PM 1044 1045 7:00-7:30 AM 705 706 3:00-3:30 PM 312 313 11:00-11:30 PM 1108 1109 7:30-8:00 AM 3:30-4:00 PM 11:30-12:00 PM 1137 1137 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DOJ-OGR-00026458

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 08/02/2019
Various time entries and signatures throughout the table

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten time entries and signatures. Some information is redacted with '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'.
